resources.string: We need to access your notifications for totally not suspicious stuff
A man should look for what is, and not what he thinks should be.
Work hard, think harder. Else be ready to accept failure.
We don\'t see things as they are, we see them as we are.
Being ignorant is not so much a shame, as being unwilling to learn.
Some people dream of success while others wake up and work.
If at first you do succeed, try something harder.
Identify your problems but give your power and energy to solutions.
Your future starts when you wake up every morning.
Success is not a good teacher, but failure is.
Everything you can imagine is real.
Plans are only good intentions unless they immediately degenerate into hard work.
For precocity, some great price is always demanded sooner or later in life.
Imagination will often carry us to worlds that never were, but without it we go nowhere.
We all must suffer one of the two pains. The pain of discipline or the pain of regret.
Don\'t stop chasing your dreams, because dreams do come true.
If you do not change direction, you may end up where you are heading.
Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. But only through experience of trial and suffering.
Courage starts with showing up and letting ourselves be seen.
If you don\'t pay the price for success, you\'ll pay the price for failure.
You can never cross the ocean unless you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
Success consists of going from failure to failure without losing enthusiasm.
